data.actual_result: GIF continues to play while not in focus
data.expected_result: GIF stops playing when not in focus
data.short_description: GIFs continue to autoplay when not in focus
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on the option for GIFs to autoplay when in focus - Upload a GIF to Discord - Scroll until the GIF is mostly out of view - Observe the GIF
